body.name: Towel Racks for Bathroom Wall Mounted, Xstydes Metal Towel Holder with Wooden Shelf for Folding Large Towels, Towel Storage for Small Bathroom Organizer Decor or RV Camping, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 22 hrs 1 min
features: Multifunctional Storage - Towel rack wall mounted maximizes the use of unused wall space to store a variety of Bath Sheet, Bath Towel, Hand Towel, Face Towel, especially suitable for small bathrooms, apartments, campers and RVs where space is limited.

Decorative Design - The combination of metal and natural wood makes this wall mounted towel rack more decorative. The wooden rack can store various aromatherapy, greenery, candle cups, rolling papers, small towels, which is the perfect solution for space saving and decorating your bathroom.

High Quality Materials - Bathroom towel rack is made of sturdy metal with a black anti-rust coating for a strong and durable finish that can withstand up to 40 lbs. Each wood panel is made of natural pine wood with unique grain, each towel rack is unique.

Flexible Application - Wooden tops can be installed Inward, Outward and No fencing, with strong compatibility and various connection methods. The side enclosure design can effectively prevent items from spilling and dropping, eliminating damage.

Easy To Install - The product is packaged with the required mounting hardware and installation instructions for your convenience, helping to complete the installation in less than 10 minutes. The top wood shelf features 4 pre-drilled holes for quick installation of the shelf and brackets without measuring.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Three Types Storage For Wood Shelf

Questions & Answers Question: What material is the wood made of and is the grain the same? Answer: The wood shelf is made of natural logs with their own special wood grain. That's why the wood grain of each towel rack is different. Each towel rack is unique! Question: How to achieve inward or outward orientation of the wood shelf? Answer: When using the screws to link the wood shelf with the towel holder, you can choose whether the wood shelf is inward or outward, and simply rotate the inward frame 180° to get the outward. Question: What should I do about Imperfect packaging and missing parts, or technical problems during installation? Answer: For the above problems, We will give the most satisfactory solution, including return and exchange, product installation support, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good design
reviews.reviewText: Material is good, and the concept is great too. Easy to put it on. Good setup for extra room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable and affordable
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect towel holder that doesn’t take up much space. In addition to holding your towels, it can hold a candle for a hot relaxing soak. Very easy to install with the step by step instructions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love how easy it is to assemble and does its job and looks very good and safes you space would definitely buy it again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Assemble
reviews.reviewText: This rack fits perfectly in our newly refreshed guest bath. Very easy to put together and mount on wall.Two large bath towels and one hand towel fits in the rack. Shelf on top is very useful for decor or washcloth stacking. Love the look!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s so easy to hang and very versatile. I love how many towels fit in it and it makes my apartment bathroom look so much more modern. Sturdy enough for what I need it to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for small spaces
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this towel storage rack!! It goes perfect with our design and fits 3 large towels perfectly! Love that is has a shelf with barrier to keep things from falling off. Assembly and install were super easy as well! Highly recommend for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for small bathrooms
reviews.reviewText: Love the design, multiple uses. Strong and plenty of reinforcements to attach to wall. Lightweight

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars simple and elegant
reviews.reviewText: I just needed something to put over the toilet to look more presentable than a blank wall, but I was really surprised with how much I liked it. It holds 3 bath size towels with no problem.The instructions included are super simple to follow, holes are predrilled, I like the fact they include a piece of paper to put on the wall so you know right where to screw everything in - I didn't use that but it's definitely helpful to have.The only thing is get some actual drywall anchors - the ones included did not work for me - but otherwise, they include an extra screw / anchor in case you lose one. Took me all of 10 minutes to assemble and put up. Definitely recommend for something simple and easy to upgrade your bathroom!
Facile d'installation. Matériel solide.Pas cher pour la qualité.Je l'adore !!
